metadata.subject: Collection of news articles on Middle Eastern affairs

organizations: U.S. House Committee on Oversight and Accountability
Global Research in International Affairs Center

relationships.description: Deteriorating relations following Mavi Marmara incident, Turkey imposing sanctions
Palestinians seeking statehood recognition through UN membership
Iran supporting Assad regime during Syrian uprising
Complex relationship with widespread skepticism and conspiracy theories about US intentions

analysis.purpose: To provide analysis of Middle Eastern geopolitical developments and shifting alliances following the Arab Spring
analysis.significance: Documents the major geopolitical shifts in the Middle East in 2011, including deteriorating Turkish-Israeli relations, Palestinian statehood efforts, and changing Arab perceptions of America post-9/11

notable_quotes: 'What's wrong with the Palestinians appealing directly to the UN after 20 years of negotiations with Israel?' - Nabil Elaraby
'The Americans had might, but were far away. Now the terrorism, like a magnet, drew them into Arab and Muslim lands.' - Fouad Ajami
'The status quo is the worst situation for us, worse than any storm that might come. I'm not in a position to bluff or make threats. It's about choices.' - Saeb Erekat
red_flags: Widespread conspiracy theories about 9/11 in Arab world
Deteriorating diplomatic relations between key US allies

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion found in these analytical news articles

illegal_activity.description: Document consists of news articles analyzing geopolitical events - no first-hand illegal activity discussed

details: Collection of news articles from various international publications
Discusses media coverage and public perception issues
References to polling data and public opinion surveys

public_knowledge.context: These are published news articles analyzing well-documented geopolitical events from 2011 that received significant media coverage

analysis.summary: This document contains seven news articles from September 2011 analyzing Middle Eastern geopolitics, focusing on deteriorating Turkish-Israeli relations following the Mavi Marmara incident, Palestinian efforts to seek UN statehood recognition, changing Arab perceptions of America post-9/11, and the regional impact of the Arab Spring on power dynamics between Iran-led and Sunni Islamist blocs.
